name: Bob Winner 2
description:
Made in 32h for Retro Game Jam 2015

Find the 3 keys and open the temple to become rich!

The goal of the jam was to make the sequel of one of the game of Loriciel.

We choose to make the sequel of Bob Winner, an Amstrad CPC game where you play an android looking for lost civilizations.

Constraints of the jam:

  • 128x128 resolution
  • 64Ko of graphic assets

Credits:

  • Antoine Semblat: Developper
  • Aurélien Montero: Sound designer & Composer
  • Julie Stuyck: 2D artist
